Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a picture of two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can represent how sound travels along the string to convey information between the students.
The student can show the materials used to create the string telephone device, such as cups and string.
The student can illustrate how the design helps solve the problem of communicating over a long distance.
The student can highlight the importance of using sound as a feature of the device to transfer information.
